name: Life (Jonathan Michell)
description:
Be taken on a journey through artwork inspired by Mark Rothko. Feel as if you're moving swiftly through an interactive museum. Choose your own journey, reflect and find meaning and reach the end...

What is the meaning of Life? Does Life really end?

A game by Jonathan Michell @jono_mich

Wind Of The Rainforest Preview by Kevin MacLeod (CC BY 4.0)
